main event: Multiple unidentified objects were observed in the sky over Berlin, New Hampshire on June 13, 1962.
interesting points: Observers reported seeing 10-15 lights initially in a diamond formation which then changed to a line,The objects blinked and disappeared one by one,The sighting lasted for approximately 30 minutes, No photographs were taken during the observation, The case remains unexplained and awaits further evaluation.
witness description: employees of an oil company with 10+ years of experience in their field
